column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Pinxto platter:  The ahi tuna on a crostini with avocado was tasty but not mind blowing.  The cheese and quince is fine.  The chorizo wrapped date tasted like fried salami or pepperoni
column2: the boys loved it haha.  The goat cheese croquette was ok and so was the mushroom ball thingy (I can't remember what it was called).  My favorite
column4: was the short rib stuffed pepper on crostini.  Soooo good.  Next time
column5: I'll order one for everyone.  They know they're short ribs
